name: NAMCO MUSEUM ESSENTIALS
description:
NAMCO MUSEUM™ ESSENTIALS brings the arcades to your living room with five classic games and a brand new arranged Xevious™ title. XEVIOUS RESSURECTION™ re-engineers the classic title with 2 player Co-op play and a digitally enhanced look and feel. Challenge your friends' high scores and unlock NM Stamps, PlayStation®Home rewards and trophies as you re-live the sightsand sounds of the 80’s. Show off your skills and play the High Score Attack Mode to compete against the world for the 1 spot. With classic hits like Pac-Man™, Galaga™, DIG DUG™, XEVIOUS™ and DRAGON SPIRIT™, you’ll be entertained for hours.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

Galaga™&© 1981-2009 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc. DIG DUG™&© 1982-2009 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc. DRAGON SPIRIT™&© 1987-2009 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc. XEVIOUS™&© 1982-2009 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc.
